item.title: Why are the Tate brothers heading to the US?
item.description: Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan have left Romania, where they were previously under a travel ban.

item.title: Gene Hackman and his wife Betsy Arakawa found dead at their home
item.description: Local police said they didn't believe any foul play was involved in the death of the couple, found alongside their dog.

item.title: Trump foreign aid freeze to stay for now, US Supreme Court chief rules
item.description: The decision goes against a lower court judge's ruling that the government had to pay aid contractors.

item.title: Succession-like feud engulfs one of Singapore's richest families
item.description: Kwek Leng Beng, the chairman of property giant CDL, has accused his son of plotting a boardroom coup.

item.title: Thailand deports dozens of Uyghurs to China
item.description: The move comes after rights groups warned the Uyghurs face torture and possibly death back in China.
